item.title: Using intuition to avoid reading binary
item.description: In the previous write-up we found that the itchy parser failed to parse mostly similar messages from 2 different market data files.

item.title: Scratching NASDAQ's ITCH
item.description: I am building yet another order book tool in Rust, which requires me to parse L3 (full) market data feed from NASDAQ.
